https://chatgpt.com/codex/tasks/task_b_68b909cc2a0c832e80cff85a8b290c27

title: Feat: Add support for importing local .obj files
description: Adds support for importing local .obj files as blob URLs for CAD components in designs.
body:
This PR introduces support for importing local `.obj` files, which are returned as blob URLs. This 
allows developers to use local 3D models for CAD components in their designs.                      
                                                                                                   
The implementation includes:                                                                       
- Updating the file resolution logic in `resolveFilePath.ts` to recognize the `.obj` extension.    
- Modifying `importLocalFile.ts` in the web worker to process `.obj` files, create a blob URL from 
their content, and provide it as the default export of the module.                                 
- Adding a new test case to verify that `.obj` files can be imported and their URLs are correctly  
applied to a component's `cadModel`.

## Summary
- add guide on using JavaScript expressions to derive component values
- demonstrate calculating resistor for voltage divider and capacitor for LC resonant circuit
- fix examples to use `<board>` rather than `<circuit>`
- escape template placeholders in snippets so site builds successfully
- supply component values as numbers instead of strings in examples
- use `<voltagesource>` and schematic-only previews in expressions guide

## Testing
- `bun test`
- `bun run build`
- `bun run format`

title: fix: correctly pass through pack placement strategies
description: Fixes the incorrect passing of pack placement strategies in the OutlineSegmentCandidatePointSolver and SingleComponentPackSolver classes.

title: Solve misaligned packing with minimum_closest_sum_squared_distance strategy
description: This pull request introduces a new packing strategy called minimum_closest_sum_squared_distance to the OutlineSegmentCandidatePointSolver and SingleComponentPackSolver classes. It implements a two-phase optimization approach to improve the packing of components by minimizing the distance to the closest target point after an initial optimization phase. The changes include modifications to existing classes and the addition of a new TwoPhaseIrlsSolver class to handle the new strategy. This enhancement aims to improve the overall efficiency and accuracy of the packing algorithm.

title: Add voltage source metadata to nets and add as condition for decoupling partition
description: Adds voltage source metadata to net definitions and modifies decoupling partition logic to require at least two decoupling capacitors connected to a positive voltage source and ground.

title: Prefer optimizing for direct connections when packing inner partition
description: Optimizes the packing algorithm to prioritize direct connections between pins, enhancing the efficiency of the packing process.

title: Decoupling Cap Partition
description: Adds functionality to separate decoupling capacitors into their own partitions while partitioning remaining chips based on strong pin connections.

title: Introduce Stage to Identify Decoupling Capacitors
description: Adds a new solver to identify decoupling capacitor groups based on specific criteria, including pin configuration and connections to main chips.
body:
- **get color from string**
- **init decoupling caps solver**
- **instructive comment**
- **introduce decoupling caps stage**
- **add caching for input problem visualization**

title: Improve Packing Symmetry by switching to minimum_closest_sum_distance pack optimization
description: Switches the packing placement strategy to minimum_closest_sum_squared_distance for improved packing symmetry in circuit layouts.

title: Force Clean Rects for Inner Partition Packing
description: Adjusts the packing algorithm to ensure that the chip body pad fully envelopes the pads, improving layout accuracy in inner partition packing.
body: ## Before ## After
